name: Crazy Lizard: The Amazing Journey
summary: It’s time for a totally amazing fast paced thrill ride! Crazy Lizard will take you on an amazing 3-D journey up a gnarly and radical giant tree! The sky is the limit as you climb to the top in this action-packed adventure! Collect shiny rings, groovy power-ups, and other surprises as you compete on a global scale using Game Center's leaderboards. Don't bump into nasty branches, slimy snails, or bombs!!!
